texto: 7.7.4 Examples of applications Typical examples of applications of reliability analysis include: — verification that components or products can meet stated reliability requirements; — projection of product life cycle cost based on a reliability analysis of data from tests at new product introduction; — guidance on decisions to make or buy off-the-shelf products, based on the analysis of their reliability, and the estimated effect on delivery targets and downstream costs related to projected failures; 20  ﻿ © ISO 2021 – All rights reserved ISO 10017:2021(E) ﻿ — projection of software product maturity based on test results, quality improvement and reliability growth, and establishing software
